items.title: Build a reusable /security-review skill core
items.problem_statement: Security checks are scattered across ad-hoc commands and project-specific flows. There is no dedicated, reusable review skill for the approval gate workflow.
blocked_by: decision: define minimum required scanners vs optional scanners
items.why_now: Provides an immediate approval-gate tool that can be reused across repositories and aligns directly with the 5-skill workflow.

items.title: Normalize findings and add a risk gate
items.problem_statement: Tool outputs are heterogeneous; without normalization there is no consistent pass/fail signal at review gates.
blocked_by: decision: default fail thresholds by severity
items.recommended_action: plan in same proposal as core
items.why_now: A normalized report unlocks practical usage and automation without requiring full CI integration first.

items.title: Add cross-project profile detection and tool adapters
items.problem_statement: A general-purpose skill must adapt to different stacks (Python, Node, containerized APIs). A static command list will fail in many repos.
blocked_by: infra: Docker daemon for ZAP baseline scans
items.why_now: User explicitly wants the skill to apply across projects, so profile/adapters are required for reliability.

items.title: Ship CI template for scheduled and PR-triggered security review
items.problem_statement: A local-only skill misses regressions between manual runs. CI templates are needed for continuous enforcement.
blocked_by: decision: CI runtime and artifact retention budget
items.why_now: Prevents drift and gives repeatable enforcement once local workflows are stable.

items.title: Integrate /security-review into /validate-feature as optional phase
items.problem_statement: Current validation has smoke security checks but no dedicated SCA/DAST phase. Security review remains outside the standard validation path.
items.why_now: Creates one cohesive validation experience once /security-review exists.
